about_the_game:
One day.. "they" began to appear...

No one knows where "they" came from.. But one thing is clear that humans are confronting a life-and-death survival.
'The Tide Intro' is an IMMERSIVE VR bridge crossing experience that will make your palms sweat!

FEATURES
MISSION: Since giant fish apocalypse, barely no ground left for human as water level rises. Your only chance is a narrow bridge in front of you. Otherwise.. giant fish will eat you up!

BE CAUTIOUS: Everything is unexpectd and unpredictable! Use flashlight(controller) to search a pitch-dark building thoroghly. You might come across something shockingly unimaginable!

TO SURVIVE: How to cross the bridge safely? Follow the guided footsteps before you.

TIME LIMIT: There is never ENOUGH time for survival. Remember, you need to hurry before the water rises.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) I7-6700 3.4GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 570 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) I7-9700 3.6Ghz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 8GB OR AMD Radeon RX Vega FE 16GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
